data.text:
I was at the movie theater on a day off when I 
happened to see Mejiro Dober in the lobby.

choices.text: Dober! What a coincidence!
Dober! What a coincidence!

data.text: !? ……Y-you're mistaking me for someone else!

No, you're Dober, right? It's me!

data.text:
……Oh, so it was you. 
Don't suddenly sneak up behind me! You surprised me!
data.name: Mejiro Dober

choices.text: Even then, you didn't have to run……

earlier, huh? In that case, then there's no point……

data.text: Actually, I was thinking of seeing this movie.
data.name: Mejiro Dober

data.text: Actually, I was thinking of seeing this movie.

data.text:
While saying that, Mejiro Dober showed me her 
smartphone and an online ticket booking webpage.
data.processed:
<story>While saying that, Mejiro Dober showed me her 
<story>smartphone and an online ticket booking webpage.

data.text:
She had booked a ticket for 『Veggie Carolyn the Movie: Summer 
Break and the Uninhabited Island!』. It was the anime she was 
practicing her drawing with before.
data.processed:
<story>She had booked a ticket for 『Veggie Carolyn the Movie: Summer 
<story>Break and the Uninhabited Island!』. It was the anime she was 
<story>practicing her drawing with before.

data.text:
Originally, I planned on seeing it together with Ryan, 
but she suddenly wasn't able to come…… so I'm here alone.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>Originally, I planned on seeing it together with Ryan, 
<story>but she suddenly wasn't able to come…… so I'm here alone.

data.text:
But, there are more kids here than I thought…… 
I'm standing out a lot, right? And it feels kind of awkward……
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>But, there are more kids here than I thought…… 
<story>I'm standing out a lot, right? And it feels kind of awkward……

data.text:
Kawakami told me the 『Pretty Fight』 movie was half adults and 
half kids, so I thought this would be the same…… it seems like 
the overwhelming majority here are kids, though.
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed:
<story>Kawakami told me the 『Pretty Fight』 movie was half adults and

data.text: There are almost no students, I'm really standing out, aren't I?
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>There are almost no students, I'm really standing out, aren't I?

data.text: ……Maybe I should just come back the next time Ryan is free……
data.name: Mejiro Dober
data.processed: <story>……Maybe I should just come back the next time Ryan is free……

data.text:
……But the number of ticket purchase bonuses is limited. 
There might not be any next time……
data.name: Mejiro Dober

Can I watch it with you?

bonus. On a laminated sheet, several characters were lined up.
